title: Design and implement SQLite database schema
description: Create the SQLite database schema for HVAC booking including tables for available_slots, bookings, and customers. Implement database.py to handle initialization and basic CRUD.
close_reason: Database schema implemented, verified, and seeded.

title: Implement HVAC Agent PocketFlow Nodes
description: Implement DecideNode, ChatNode, ExtractionNode, and BookingNode in agent/nodes.py using PocketFlow. Integrate with database.py and call_llm.py.
close_reason: Implemented all core nodes, flow, and CLI for the HVAC agent.

title: Generate 100 synthetic conversation scenarios
description: Implement a batch generation flow in PocketFlow to create 100 diverse HVAC booking dialogues and save them to data/scenarios.yaml.
close_reason: Generated 105 synthetic scenarios and saved to data/scenarios.json using a dependency-free parallel flow.
